  • Users API

Create a new user

This action will create a new user with the properties which have been provided.

Try this request in your browser

/api/ /users/create

Headers

X-Auth-Application
X-Auth-Token

Parameters

username String
first_name String
last_name String
email_address String
password String
admin Boolean 

The request output will be shown here...

URL

/api/v1/users/create

Access

Must be authenticated with a valid user API token. If not authorised, a NotAuthenticated error will be returned.

Parameters

Parameter Type Default

username

The user's username

 String null

first_name

The user's first name

 String null

last_name

The user's last name

 String null

email_address

The user's e-mail address

 String null

password

The user's password

 String null

admin

Should this user be an admin?

 Boolean null

Errors

Error Attributes

ValidationError

The details provided were not sufficient to save the user

  • errors

    An array of errors for each field

Response Data

This action will return a user structure.

You'll receive all attributes for this structure (basic and extended attributes).
